item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0373; 08:41AM; 3717 S Mountain View Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F8ex61; Mar Vista; KNOCKDOWN: 39 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes. The fire was held to the 2nd floor with some extension into the attic. No other structures were damaged. There have not been any hospital transports as this time but one patient remains under evaluation, condition unknown. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E237 E263 E59 E63 E67 EM18 RA19 RA59 RA63 T37 T5 T63; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0373; 08:16AM; 3717 S Mountain View Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F8ex61; Mar Vista; Two story, single family dwelling with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode with fire on the 2nd floor with possible extension into the attic. One patient (age/gender unknown) is being evaluated for yet to be determined injuries/medical complaint. One additional task force was requested. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E237 E263 E59 E63 E67 EM18 RA19 RA59 RA63 T37 T5 T63; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Auto vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#0288; 07:58AM; 12800 W San Vicente Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3kxgmjj; Brentwood; Firefighters responded to a reported auto vs pedestrian and determined one person deceased on scene. (age/gender unknown). All questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD West LA Div Inc# 900 and LA County Coroner. The 9-1-1 call was received at 6:52AM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; E19 RA37; CH4; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0286; 07:20AM; Nb 405 Tr; MAP: https://bit.ly/375E7vK; Sherman Oaks; Firefighters are on scene of a multi-vehicle (to include one rollover) collision spread across a 1/4-1/2 mi section of the NB 405 Freeway. Patient count is currently 4 with no life threatening injuries (no further specifics on patients at this time). Traffic will remain heavily impacted and drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. Refer to CHP Log# 0640 for any traffic updates. The 9-1-1 call was received at 6:49AM. No further details.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 E109 E239 E288 E88 EM14 EM17 RA83 RA837 RA878 RA88 T39 T88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0197; 05:46AM; 1325 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Fc50eg; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 134 firefighters extinguished the fire in two hours and four minutes with no injuries reported. LAFD Arson is on scene, per protocol, for cause determination. Crews will remain through the morning as they chase down smoldering areas while working around safety hazards caused by the partial roof collapse. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E227 E26 E266 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HE1 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA14 RA209 RA809 RA810 RA827 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T26 T27 T3 T66 T9 UR27 UR88; CH7; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 05/01/2022 INC#0197

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0197; 04:30AM; 1325 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Fc50eg; Downtown; Over 100 firefighters have now responded in to the *two-story* row of commercials on fire. Firefighters have shifted to defensive tactics (from the exterior only). MEDIA: PIO/Captain Branden Silverman en route, with an ETA of 5:20am.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E227 E26 E266 E3 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA209 RA809 RA810 RA827 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T26 T27 T3 T66 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0197; 03:42AM; 1325 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Fc50eg; Downtown; One-story row of commercials with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E203 E209 E210 E211 E226 E227 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA809 RA810 RA827 SQ21 T10 T11 T26 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Update Confined Space Rescue; INC#1473; 10:50PM; EB 210 Fwy x Hubbard; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B9e1Sv; Sylmar; Two LAFD confined-space rescuers made entry, descended through the shaft (supported above by the aerial ladder), and searched over 100 feet in each direction. Thankfully, no victims were found.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E275 E288 E289 E298 E88 E91 EM15 HR3 PI4 RA75 RA889 RA91 T75 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Confined Space Rescue; INC#1473; 08:50PM; EB 210 Fwy x Hubbard; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B9e1Sv; Sylmar; LAPD and CHP are on scene where they received *reports of* two deceased persons at least 20 feet down a maintenance hole in the ground. Due to the nature of the space and entry portal, LAFD Confined Space Rescue Specialists will don special equipment and make entry to investigate, consistent with industry regulations. There is still no visual confirmation of patients. The confined space entry will allow an underground investigation into this reported emergency.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E275 E288 E289 E298 E88 E91 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA889 RA91 T75 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1415; 09:19PM; 8232 S Delgany Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LBNlPi; Playa del Rey; A well-established fire spread from the one-story attached garaged and burned through much of the second story and the entire attic of the two-story home. It took 61 firefighters 64 minutes to fully extinguish the flames. The fire was confined to the building of origin. One occupant complained of minor burns and was treated and released on scene. One firefighter was injured by falling debris from above, and was also treated and released (to continue working) on scene. Sadly, one feline pet is in grave condition, with firefighters performing resuscitative measures. The cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM42 E205 E263 E266 E27 E288 E295 E5 E58 E62 E67 EA1 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA5 RA62 RA867 RA95 T5 T63 T66 T88 T95 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14 15; Nicholas Prange
